pkgmetadata.longdescription: A 'shiny' Application for Exploring Laboratory Data // A novel concept for generating knowledge and gaining insights into laboratory data. You will be able to efficiently and easily explore your laboratory data from different perspectives. Janitza, S., Majumder, M., Mendolia, F., Jeske, S., Kulmann, H. (2021) doi:10.1007/s43441-021-00318-4.
